title: Minecraft PC/Mac版销量即将达到1600万份
txt_content:
本帖最后由 cyqsimon 于 2014-7-8 10:58 编辑 

PC/Mac version15,998,190 people have bought the game. 
In the last 24 hours, 18,855 people bought the game. 
消息来自：minecraft.net/stats

截止至本帖发布，Minecraft PC/mac的销量已经达到了15,998,190 份。Minecraft PC/Mac的销量即将冲击1600万份


PS:16,000,000X20欧=320,000,000欧=约2,560,000,000人民币
Mojang简直赚翻了






Minecraft.png
(65.03 KB, 下载次数: 25)




下载附件


2014-7-7 20:39 上传
